changeSet.author: astrauss
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE AUDIT_BATCH( BATCH_ID uniqueidentifier NOT NULL, OWNER_PERSONNEL_ID uniqueidentifier NULL, MTGEE5 char(5) NULL, ORIGINAL_OWNER_PERSONNEL_ID uniqueidentifier NULL, CREATED_BY char(6) NULL, UPDATED_BY char(6) NULL, CREATED_TS datetime NULL, UPDATED_TS datetime NULL, BATCH_REFERENCE_ID varchar(16) NULL, OPERATIONAL_REVIEW_IND char(1) NULL, REQUEST_OPERATIONAL_DOCUMENTS_IND char(1) NULL, SECONDARY_REFERENCE varchar(100) NULL, OPERATIONAL_REVIEW_GUIDANCE varchar(max) NULL, SELECTION_REQUEST_ID uniqueidentifier NULL, BATCH_STATUS_ID uniqueidentifier NULL, REVIEW_LOCATION_ID uniqueidentifier NULL, RECEIVED_OPERATIONAL_DOCUMENTS_IND char(1) NULL, AUDIT_CREATED_TS datetime not null, AUDIT_ACTION_CODE char(1) not null)

changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE AUDIT_RVW_LVL_CASE_SUMMARY( REVIEW_LEVEL_ID uniqueidentifier NOT NULL, ASSUMED_LOAN_IND char(1) NULL, CASHOUT_REFI_IND char(1) NULL, DISASTER_IND char(1) NULL, GIFT_LTR_AMT numeric(16, 2) NULL, GIFT_LTR_2_AMT numeric(16, 2) NULL, GIFT_LTR_SRC varchar(32) NULL, GIFT_LTR_2_SOURCE varchar(32) NULL, INVEST_2ND_RESID_IND char(1) NULL, NUM_LIVING_UNITS numeric(3, 0) NULL, LOAN_PRPS varchar(3) NULL, RATIO_LOAN_TO_VL_NEW numeric(10, 5) NULL, LOAN_TYPE varchar(16) NULL, FCTRY_FBRCT char(1) NULL, MAX_CLAIM_AMT numeric(16, 2) NULL, CURRENT_AT_ENDORSE_IND char(1) NULL, PD_STRMLN_FLG varchar(3) NULL, RFNC_CD varchar(16) NULL, SOA_CD varchar(16) NULL, UNDERWRITING_METHOD varchar(16) NULL, ENDRS_BYND_60_DAYS_CLOSE_IND char(1) NULL, NON_OCCUPYING_BORR_IND char(1) NULL, SALE_PRICE_GTR_ACQ_COST_IND char(1) NULL, INSUR_APP_IN_TIME_IND char(1) NULL, CREATED_BY varchar(6) NULL, UPDATED_BY varchar(6) NULL, CREATED_TS datetime NULL, UPDATED_TS datetime NULL, ASSETS_AFTER_CLOSING_UW numeric(16, 2) NULL, TOT_ASSETS_UW numeric(16, 2) NULL, RATIO_FIX_TEI_UW numeric(10, 5) NULL, BORR_HSNG_EXP_UW numeric(16, 2) NULL, FICO_DECISION_SCORE_UW int NULL, RATIO_TOT_PMT_TO_TOT_INC_UW numeric(10, 5) NULL, TOT_MNTHLY_MTG_PYMT_UW numeric(16, 2) NULL, TOT_CLSNG_CSTS_UW numeric(16, 2) NULL, DCSN_CD_UW varchar(16) NULL, TOT_FIXED_PYMT_UW numeric(16, 2) NULL, TOT_ASSETS_ENDRS numeric(16, 2) NULL, RATIO_FIX_TEI_ENDRS numeric(10, 5) NULL, BORR_HSNG_EXP_ENDRS numeric(16, 2) NULL, FICO_DECISION_SCORE_ENDRS int NULL, RATIO_TOT_PMT_TO_TOT_INC_ENDRS numeric(10, 5) NULL, TOT_MNTHLY_MTG_PYMT_ENDRS numeric(16, 2) NULL, TOT_CLSNG_CSTS_ENDRS numeric(16, 2) NULL, DCSN_CD_ENDRS varchar(16) NULL, TOT_FIXED_PYMT_ENDRS numeric(16, 2) NULL, MNDTRY_OBLGTNS_AMT numeric(16, 2) NULL, BNKRPTCY_CHPTR13_IND char(1) NULL, BNKRPTCY_CHPTR7_IND char(1) NULL, GIFT_LTR_TIN varchar(13) NULL, ORIG_MRTG_AMT numeric(16, 2) NULL, PRPRTY_APRSL_VL numeric(16, 2) NULL, SECONDARY_FINANCE_AMT numeric(16, 2) NULL, CLAIM_TYPE varchar(16) NULL, MARRIED_TO_NBS_IND char(1) NULL, BORR_1_NAME varchar(100) NULL, BORR_2_NAME varchar(100) NULL, BORR_1_SSN varchar(11) NULL, BORR_2_SSN varchar(11) NULL, CLSNG_DT datetime NULL, CONST_CD varchar(16) NULL, BNKRPTCY_ANY_IND char(1) NULL, SECONDARY_FINANCE_EXISTS_IND char(1) NULL, BORR_TYP varchar(16) NULL, REO_100_DOWN_PMT_PROG_IND char(1) NULL, AMORT_TYP_CD varchar(16) NULL, LOAN_OFFICER varchar(100) NULL, LOAN_OFFICER_NMLS varchar(12) NULL, SELLER_CNTRBTN numeric(16, 2) NULL, SELLER_CNTRBTN_PCNT numeric(10, 5) NULL, BORR_PAID_CLOSING_COSTS numeric(16, 2) NULL, BORR_REQD_INVEST_TO_CLOSE numeric(16, 2) NULL, BACK_TO_WORK_IND char(1) NULL, COMBINED_LOAN_TO_VALUE_PCT numeric(10, 5) NULL, ESCROW_AMOUNT numeric(16, 2) NULL, TOTAL_REQUIRED_FUNDS_TO_CLOSE numeric(16, 2) NULL, HUD_REO_REPAIR_AMT numeric(16, 2) NULL, MORT_EXCLD_FNCD_MIP numeric(16, 2) NULL, MAN_UW_STRETCH_RATIO_IND char(1) NULL, ORGNTNG_MTGEE_NMLS_ID varchar(12) NULL, QUALIFIED_MRTG_POINTS_AND_FEES numeric(16, 2) NULL, INT_RT numeric(10, 5) NULL, SALES_PRICE numeric(16, 2) NULL, SPECIAL_PROGRAM varchar(30) NULL, TOT_MNTHLY_EFF_INCM numeric(16, 2) NULL, YEAR_BUILT varchar(4) NULL, EFF_DATE_APRSL_UPDATE datetime NULL, APPRAISER_NAME varchar(100) NULL, SITE_TYPE varchar(30) NULL, PRIOR_SALE_WITHIN_LAST_3YR_IND char(1) NULL, DATE_OF_PRIOR_SALE datetime NULL, PRICE_OF_PRIOR_SALE numeric(16, 2) NULL, RCV_SALE_DT datetime NULL, LAST_SERVICING_MRTG_XFER_DT datetime NULL, ARM_INDX_EXPCTD_RT numeric(10, 5) NULL, TEN_YR_RATE_LOCK_IND char(1) NULL, ADDTNL_10PCT_IPL_USAGE_IND char(1) NULL, MANDATORY_OBLIG_BORR_AMT numeric(16, 2) NULL, MANDATORY_OBLIG_LEND_AMT numeric(16, 2) NULL, HECM_COUNSEL_DT datetime NULL, APPLICATION_DATE datetime NULL, BORR_BRTH_DT datetime NULL, EXPECTED_RATE numeric(10, 5) NULL, HECM_COUNSEL_CERT_NO varchar(36) NULL, INIT_DISBURSEMENT_LIMIT numeric(16, 2) NULL, HECM_PRNCPL_LMT numeric(16, 2) NULL, MAX_RATE numeric(10, 5) NULL, ORIGINATION_FEE numeric(16, 2) NULL, PAYMENT_PLAN varchar(16) NULL, TAXES_INSRNC_FRST_YR_AMT numeric(16, 2) NULL, REPAIR_COMPLETION_DATE datetime NULL, BORR_1_RENTING_IND char(1) NULL, BORR_1_SELF_EMPL_IND char(1) NULL, BORR_1_FIRST_TIME_BUYER_IND char(1) NULL, ARM_IND varchar(3) NULL, BLDG_TYP char(1) NULL, BUILDING_ON_OWN_LAND_IND char(1) NULL, FLIPPING_CATEGORY_2_IND char(1) NULL, FRCLSR_IND char(1) NULL, DEFAULT_EPISODE_EXISTS_IND char(1) NULL, ADP_CODE varchar(16) NULL, GIFT_LTR_2_TIN varchar(11) NULL, MISC_AUS_DCSN_CD varchar(16) NULL, BNKRPTCY_CD varchar(16) NULL, FRCLSR_STRT_DT datetime NULL, FT_IN_EPS_3MNTH_DELQ_DT datetime NULL, LOSSMIT_CD varchar(16) NULL, OCPNCY_STS_CD varchar(16) NULL, OLDST_UNPD_DT datetime NULL, TERM_TYP_CD varchar(16) NULL, ENDRSMNT_DT datetime NULL, REFINANCE_IND char(1) NULL, CASE_NUMBER varchar(11) NULL, PROP_ADDR_1 varchar(100) NULL, PROP_ADDR_2 varchar(100) NULL, PROP_ADDR_CITY varchar(100) NULL, PROP_ADDR_ZIP varchar(5) NULL, PROP_ADDR_ST char(2) NULL, BNKRPTCY_DT datetime NULL, MNFCTRD_HUSNG_IND char(1) NULL, PRODUCT_TYPE_CD varchar(5) NULL, REVIEW_TYPE_CD char(1) NULL, AUDIT_CREATED_TS datetime not null, AUDIT_ACTION_CODE char(1) not null)

changeSet.author: astrauss
changeSet.sql: if exists (select * from sysobjects where type = 'TR' and name = 'tI_BATCH') drop trigger tI_BATCH

changeSet.author: astrauss
changeSet.createProcedure:
CREATE TRIGGER tI_BATCH ON BATCH FOR insert AS BEGIN insert into AUDIT_BATCH( BATCH_ID , OWNER_PERSONNEL_ID , MTGEE5, ORIGINAL_OWNER_PERSONNEL_ID , CREATED_BY , UPDATED_BY , CREATED_TS , UPDATED_TS , BATCH_REFERENCE_ID, OPERATIONAL_REVIEW_IND, REQUEST_OPERATIONAL_DOCUMENTS_IND, SECONDARY_REFERENCE, OPERATIONAL_REVIEW_GUIDANCE, SELECTION_REQUEST_ID, BATCH_STATUS_ID, REVIEW_LOCATION_ID, RECEIVED_OPERATIONAL_DOCUMENTS_IND, AUDIT_CREATED_TS, AUDIT_ACTION_CODE) select BATCH_ID , OWNER_PERSONNEL_ID , MTGEE5, ORIGINAL_OWNER_PERSONNEL_ID , CREATED_BY , UPDATED_BY , CREATED_TS , UPDATED_TS , BATCH_REFERENCE_ID, OPERATIONAL_REVIEW_IND, REQUEST_OPERATIONAL_DOCUMENTS_IND, SECONDARY_REFERENCE, OPERATIONAL_REVIEW_GUIDANCE, SELECTION_REQUEST_ID, BATCH_STATUS_ID, REVIEW_LOCATION_ID, RECEIVED_OPERATIONAL_DOCUMENTS_IND, getdate(), 'C' from inserted
END

changeSet.author: astrauss
changeSet.sql: if exists (select * from sysobjects where type = 'TR' and name = 'tU_BATCH') drop trigger tU_BATCH

changeSet.author: astrauss
changeSet.createProcedure:
CREATE TRIGGER tU_BATCH ON BATCH FOR update AS BEGIN insert into AUDIT_BATCH( BATCH_ID , OWNER_PERSONNEL_ID , MTGEE5, ORIGINAL_OWNER_PERSONNEL_ID , CREATED_BY , UPDATED_BY , CREATED_TS , UPDATED_TS , BATCH_REFERENCE_ID, OPERATIONAL_REVIEW_IND, REQUEST_OPERATIONAL_DOCUMENTS_IND, SECONDARY_REFERENCE, OPERATIONAL_REVIEW_GUIDANCE, SELECTION_REQUEST_ID, BATCH_STATUS_ID, REVIEW_LOCATION_ID, RECEIVED_OPERATIONAL_DOCUMENTS_IND, AUDIT_CREATED_TS, AUDIT_ACTION_CODE) select BATCH_ID , OWNER_PERSONNEL_ID , MTGEE5, ORIGINAL_OWNER_PERSONNEL_ID , CREATED_BY , UPDATED_BY , CREATED_TS , UPDATED_TS , BATCH_REFERENCE_ID, OPERATIONAL_REVIEW_IND, REQUEST_OPERATIONAL_DOCUMENTS_IND, SECONDARY_REFERENCE, OPERATIONAL_REVIEW_GUIDANCE, SELECTION_REQUEST_ID, BATCH_STATUS_ID, REVIEW_LOCATION_ID, RECEIVED_OPERATIONAL_DOCUMENTS_IND, getdate(), 'U' from inserted
END

changeSet.sql: if exists (select * from sysobjects where type = 'TR' and name = 'tI_AUDIT_UNDERWRITER_INCREASED_SELECTION') drop trigger tI_AUDIT_UNDERWRITER_INCREASED_SELECTION

changeSet.author: astrauss
changeSet.createProcedure: CREATE TRIGGER tI_AUDIT_UNDERWRITER_INCREASED_SELECTION ON UNDERWRITER_INCREASED_SELECTION FOR insert AS BEGIN insert into AUDIT_UNDERWRITER_INCREASED_SELECTION( UNDERWRITER_ID, COMMENTS, EFFECTIVE_DATE, FWD_PERCENT, HECM_PERCENT, CREATED_BY, UPDATED_BY, CREATED_TS, UPDATED_TS, AUDIT_CREATED_TS, AUDIT_ACTION_CODE) select UNDERWRITER_ID, COMMENTS, EFFECTIVE_DATE, FWD_PERCENT, HECM_PERCENT, CREATED_BY, UPDATED_BY, CREATED_TS, UPDATED_TS, getdate(), 'C' from inserted END
